entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 1 "In The Beginning..."

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 1 "In The Beginning..."
media:group.media:description: Have you ever made a good picture of an animal and felt pleased about it? God made real live animals and a whole new worldâ€”and it was very good! God saw all that He had made, and it was very good. GENESIS 1:31, NIV.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 2 "God's Friends"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 2 "God's Friends"
media:group.media:description: Do you have a friend? Someone to be with often? Someone you like a lot? In the begin- ning of our world, God made two special friends. This is how it happened . . .God said, Let us make man in our image. Genesis 1:26, NIV. God made people to be His friends.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 3 "A Special Day"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 3 "A Special Day"
media:group.media:description: What day do you like best? Do you know that God made a special day for you and your family to enjoy? God blessed the seventh day and made it holy. Genesis 2:3, NIV. God made the Sabbath for us because He loves us.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 4 "Hiding From God"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 4 "Hiding From God"
media:group.media:description: Have you ever done something so naughty that you were ashamed? A long time ago Adam and Eve did just that. "The Lord is good and his love endures forever. Psalm 100:5, NIV. God loves us all the time, even when we do wrong.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 5 "Noah Builds A Boat"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 5 "Noah Builds A Boat"
media:group.media:description: Do you know how to make a wooden boat? A long time ago God told Noah to build a big boat. But Noah didnt know how. Who do you think showed him what to do? "We will obey the voice of the Lord." Jememiah 42:6, NKJV. We worship God when we obey Him.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 6 "An Animal Parade"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 6 "An Animal Parade"
media:group.media:description: Isnt it fun to watch a parade? A long time ago Noah and his neighbors watched a strange animal parade. Memory Verse -- I will praise you forever for what you have done. Psalm 52:9, NIV. We thank God for taking care of us.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 7 "A Floating Zoo"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 7 "A Floating Zoo"
media:group.media:description: What do you do when it rains day after day? The Bible tells about Noah and 40 days of rain. What did Noah do? "Great is the Lord, and most worthy of praise." Psalm 48:1, NIV. We thank God for keeping His promises.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 8 "God's Rainbow Promise"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 8 "God's Rainbow Promise"
media:group.media:description: Have you ever seen a rainbow? Sometimes you can see one after it rains. Noah and his family saw the very first rainbow God made. Do you know why? I have set my rainbow in the clouds . . . it will be [a] sign. GENESIS 9:13, NIV. We thank God for His promises.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 9 "Abram Follows God"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 9 "Abram Follows God"
media:group.media:description: Have you ever moved to a new house? A new city or country? Movingis not easy. There are so many things to pack. So many friends toleave. A long time ago God told Abram to leave his home and gofar away to another country. What do you think Abram did?

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 10 "Abram's Altars"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 10 "Abram's Altars"
media:group.media:description:
Where does your family worship God? Do you have a special place for family worship? Where do you worship on Sabbath? Abram didnt have a church to go to. He didnt even have a room in a house. But he worshiped God everywhere he went. And he led others to worship God too.
Worship the Lord with gladness. Psalm 100:2, NIV. Christian families worship God together.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 11 "Lot Chooses First"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 11 "Lot Chooses First"
media:group.media:description:
When you play with others, do you share? Do you let them have the first choice? Abram did. He let Lot choose first.
Lets not have any quarreling between you and me. GENESIS 13:8, NIV. Gods people put others first.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 12 "Abram To The Rescue"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 12 "Abram To The Rescue"
media:group.media:description: Who helps you when you are in trouble or afraid? Abram helped Lot when some enemies cap- tured him. It happened like this . . . I will accept nothing belonging to you. GENESIS 14:23, NIV. We serve others out of love.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 13 "Special Baby"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 1 Episode 13 "Special Baby"
media:group.media:description: Do you like surprises? Happy ones? What is the best surprise you have ever had? Something special. Something you didnt know would happen. God gave Abraham and Sarah something special . . . and Sarah laughed! Let us love one another, for love comes from God. 1 John 4:7, NIV. People in Christian families love one another.
